titleStmt.title: A replie to a relation, of the conference between William Laude and Mr. Fisher the Jesuite. By a witnesse of Jesus Christ
titleStmt.author: Burton, Henry, 1578-1648.

notesStmt.note: A witnesse of Jesus Christ = Henry Burton.
A reply to: Laud, William. A relation of the conference betweene William Lawd, then, Lrd. Bishop of St. Davids; now, Lord Arch-Bishop of Canterbury: and Mr. Fisher the Jesuite.
Identified as STC 10913 on UMI microfilm reel 956.
Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery and the British Library.
Appears at reel 917 (Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy) and at reel 956 (British Library copy).
